entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chevery
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:44 AM AST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chevery 09:00 AM AST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: -22.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -28.7°C
Wind: NW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
